title: Amazon Essentials Men's Long-Sleeve Flannel Shirt, Regular-Fit, Two Pockets
description: REGULAR FIT: Our men's flannel shirt offers a comfortable, easy fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist
BRUSHED COTTON FLANNEL: Experience the warmth and softness of 100% cotton twill, which is durable and versatile
EVERYDAY STYLE: Pair this men's flannel with jeans or khakis for a casual look, or layer for added warmth
PRACTICAL DESIGN: This men's flannel shirt features a straight collar, button-up front, long sleeves with adjustable buttoned cuffs, and double chest pockets

Discover comfort and style with our versatile flannel shirt for men, designed to add both warmth and practicality to your wardrobe. Crafted from 100% cotton twill flannel brushed for softness, this men's flannel offers a comfortable and easy fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist. The double chest pockets with button-through flaps add a touch of functionality.
